channel.title: [Suggestion] The Exiled Queen (Unique)
channel.description:
"She was not dead, she came back for... Power." - The King
The Exiled Queen: Offensive Neutral Class Goal: Step up and reclaim the Throne one more time!
Passives:
1- Im back! If The Exiled Queen Steps up, she becomes que Queen, the Immune to death version of the King. The Queen cant be voted up for treason.
2- Failure If the Exiled Queen cant get the throne back, she will commit suicide at the end of the game.
Day Abilitiy: Dark Potion: Makes you Immune to death tonight (3 uses)
Night Abilities:
Royal Check: Checks a player and verifies if they are Royal Blood members (Infinite Uses)
Betrayal: Kill a Player, does not work if you target non-royal members of the court. Does not kill the King. 3 Uses.
Strategy: Blue Dragon will not accept the exiled queen, since she can kill the Prince,Drunk, Princess and the Noble. You probably want to claim Alchemist
Evil Faction/Neutral Killer can be Helpful for you, since they can kill Royal members. But watch out, evil can also step up!
Hope you like my idea! Thanks for reading!
Alan#7191
